system.description:
You have learned to weave the power of your own mind and that of your divine patron together in potent new ways. You gain the following benefits:

  • Half your Esper levels count as Cleric levels for the purposes of the advancement of the Channel Divinity feature.
  • You can expend a use of Channel Divinity to recover a psionic die if you are below your maximum.
  • Half your Cleric levels count as Esper levels for the purpose of determining the size of your Psychic Reservoir and the size of your Psi Dice.
